Message.Title: Brian Nowak "upgraded" Ebay to a but from a Hold..
Message.Msg: The only problem is that M"r Nowak made some pretty bad "recommendations" lately and has a pretty poor performance (E.g. recommending facebook 3 month ago and giving it a "strong buy" and a 40$ price target)... According to TipRanks he has a problematic track record and success ratio. I suggest downloading TipRanks (if its still free).

eBay is showing historic technical movement

Message.Title: EBAY Will NOW Make it Easier to RETURN Items..............
Message.Msg: Buyers will now have a button to click on when they want to return an item. Ebay will generate a return shipping label and if the buyer simply checks off the reason for the return as "NOT AS DESCRIBED", the seller will be charged the return shipping cost.....This must be part of the Fall Seller Update which was pitched as offering great benefits to sellers........YEAH RIGHT!
I trust I will have your support in November.

Message.Title: We Are Already Getting RETURNS Thanks To Ebay's New Policy
Message.Msg: A person with zero feedback just e-mailed us saying they want to return they're item. Apparently they don't know they didn't even have to ask now. It seems this person didn't pay for their order until 10 days after they clicked "Buy-it-Now". Now they want to return it. No problem, but if they had gone through Ebay's new return system, we'd be stuck with the return postage as well. This looks like another nightmare for sellers, it may be the worst yet. This is going to kill of a lot of sellers, No Doubt!
